body.name: Proactiv Green Tea and Hyularonic Acid Moisturizer Hydrating Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oily Skin, Dry Skin and Acne Prone Skin - 3 Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 hrs 50 mins
features: PERFECT FOR BLEMISH PRONE SKIN: This lightweight, oil free moisturizer is rich in mineral and botanical extracts, including the potent antioxidant green tea, and helps hydrate dry skin without clogging pores.
HYDRATE WITH HYALURONIC ACID: Having hyaluronic acid in your facial moisturizer helps to maintain skin’s hydration, thanks to its ability to act as a moisture magnet and attract water to the skin.
HYDRATION FOR IRRITATED SKIN: Proactiv's lightweight and moisturizing face cream is designed to deliver hydration to dry, acne-prone skin.
GOOD TO GLOW: Dull, tired looking skin is gently rejuvenated with this lightweight, hydrating moisturizer.
FROM THE COMPANY THAT STARTED A SKINCARE REVOLUTION: Designed specifically for acne-prone sensitive skin, Proactiv Green Tea Moisturizer is a refreshing step toward healthy, radiant skin.
body.description: Give your skin a daily dose of nature's most powerful antioxidant, green tea. This light-weight moisturizing serum is designed to deliver hydration to dry, irritated skin. Dull, tired looking skin is gently rejuvenated with this nourishing rich hydrating moisturizer. Directions: Apply daily, as needed, to alleviate dryness. Can be worn alone or under makeup. When using the 3-step system, the Green Tea Moisturizer should be applied after Step 3. If going outside, wear a sunscreen SPF 15 or higher. Warnings: For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, flush gently and thoroughly with water. Discontinue use if irritation or rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a poison control center right away.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Soothe Your Skin Proactiv Green Tea Moisturizer A Proactiv favorite! This lightweight, non-greasy formula is rich in mineral and botanical extracts, including green tea, to help soothe dry skin without clogging pores. It’s your perfect moisturizer for blemish-prone skin. Includes: Green Tea EGCG: a potent antioxidant designed to fight free radicals while helping to soothe and calm the skin.Hyaluronic Acid: helps to maintain skin’s hydration thanks to its ability to act as a moisture magnet and attract water to the skin.

Proactiv Moisturizers Soothes & Hydrates GreenTea Antioxidant Hyaluronic Acid Salicilyic Acid SPF 30 Absorb Oil & Shine Soothes & Hydrates GreenTea Antioxidant Hyaluronic Acid Salicilyic Acid SPF 30 Absorb Oil & Shine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go to moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Proactiv's Green Tea Moisturizer has become my winter skincare essential. It's my go-to, ensuring hydration without causing breakouts. The refreshing scent adds to the experience, making it a reliable and pleasant choice for maintaining healthy skin during the colder months. Worth your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Review of the Proactive Green Tea Moisturizer. Wow, I've been using this moisturizer for 2 weeks now and what a difference. I found it through a Google search, looking for moisturizer for middle age, red, oily, combo skin that is prone to small breakouts. Add to that rough skin that has come in the last year or so. I've never found anything that works. I didn't even change my other products, but now I may change my cleanser. Just the moisturizer has taken the redness down a lot, I'm not breaking out, my skin is smooth again, and my skin does not become the oil slick mess that it usually does by noon time. Even at bed time, NO OIL. And it's not even over drying my skin. AND it's Winter! I sure hope this lasts, because I'm quite happy. The scent is quite strong at first, and normally I cannot do scents due to allergies (I buy all fragrance free products). However, I stuck it out with this and found that this isn't clogging up my nose or making me unable to sleep. So it's fine. I do wish it were fragrance free, but still give 5 stars for how well it's working for me. It soaks in quickly. My make-up goes on just fine over top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this moisturizer, but a bit overpriced
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice moisturizer, and very lightweight. I have combination skin and this moisturizer was great, since it is hydrating without making my skin oily. It also feels very good on your skin. My only complaint is the price. I feel like this is a bit overpriced. It's not an extraordinary, one of a kind product. There are plenty of moisturizers that you can get that are just as good for half the price. I got this moisturizer on sale for 50% off during the Amazon Prime sale. I love this moisturizer, but I won't be buying it again just because I feel like it's way overpriced otherwise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what my skin needed!
reviews.reviewText: I've been suffering from terrible maskne! All of my life I've been able to use regular body lotion on my face with no issues. But I'm older now and my skin is changing, plus I wear a mask most of the day now thanks to COVID. Not only has my face been breaking out but, I wear glasses, and the combo of my glasses, hot breath, and mask has made me breakout in the skin just under my eyes. And it's been bad! I started doing some research and decided to get products that are oil free and some other words that escape me as I write this. I ordered a ton of products to try and so far this is my favorite! It feels so good! It's soothing and refreshing. It's everything my face needed! And those breakouts under my eyes are almost all the way gone! I can't believe I fought the facial beauty game for so long because I thought what I was doing was working. These products are great. This gel doesn't feel thick like other moisturizers but it is still moisturizing. Very sheer. I don't often wear makeup but I think it would be ideal for under foundation and powder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This moisturizer was drying to my skin. I like the smell and texture though. Once it absorbs it drys out my face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long time user
reviews.reviewText: I am not a fan of the Proactive product line, except for this one item. I have used it for years because it helps balance the oils of my face, goes on relatively dry, and has no greasy after feel to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
